attributes.action: Stop McNulty From Destroying Our Railway
attributes.additional_details: Sir Roy Mcnulty has declared war against the railway workers of this country to squeeze even more profits for private shareholders why are the government attacking what they privatised so many years ago why are they involving themselves in privately run companies who are paying the government dividends! Let's stop the nonsense now so we save jobs this government keeps on promising job creation with this would be mass job destruction please sign many thanks
